# Anastasiya Pavlyk Portfolio

> Portfolio website of Anastasiya Pavlyk, a product designer specializing in fintech tools.

## About

Anastasiya Pavlyk is a product designer with 5+ years of experience in fintech. She designs trading platforms and financial software where every interaction matters. Her work focuses on making complex workflows intuitive while ensuring designs meet compliance requirements.

## Contact

- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/anastasiya-pavlyk/
- Website: https://apavlyk.cc

## Work

Anastasiya leads design initiatives end-to-end â€” from discovery and user research to high-fidelity prototypes and handoff.

### Case Studies

- Mobile Trading Platform: Designing a mobile-first trading web application
- Asset Management App: Redesigning an asset management application
- Block Trade Functionality: Designing block trade features for institutional traders

## Skills

- UX/UI Design
- User Research
- Prototyping
- Design Systems
- Accessibility (WCAG)
- Fintech Domain Expertise

## Optional

This site is built with Astro, Tailwind CSS, and deployed as a static site.
